title: fix(ui): add cursor-pointer to select all buttons
author: fisventurous

gist.summary: Added proper cursor feedback to 'Select all' and category toggle buttons in the permissions dashboard.
gist.impact: Users will experience better visual feedback when managing API key permissions.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee adjusting a retro control panel with toggle switches, representing the permissions UI update.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee adjusting toggle switches on a retro dashboard control panel. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Unpacking. Pixel text 'SETTINGS'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
